project.description: Runs tempest full on a specified QA hardware. Useful only for cloud that was built by mkcloud. Mandatory parameter: hw_number <!-- Managed by Jenkins Job Builder -->

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: hw_number
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mandatory, number of the QA cloud server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: scenario_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional; scenario name which typically is an integer with a single letter

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: scenario_job_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional; name of the scenario jenkins job that is used to trigger this job

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: scenario_build_number
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional; scenario build number that triggered this job

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: testsetup
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Run tempest with testsetup() in qa_crowbarsetup.sh script
